div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 331 Crete, before 1908 (282) Burial: c. 90-80 B.C. Contents: c. 13 AR Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Herakleion Thompson, Athens (Cretan Hoard I), pp. 515-6, illus. The 7 other coins of Noe 282 are not part of this find. They were published in Athens (p. 522) as possibly a separate hd., but Le Rider (Monn. cr√©t., p. 296) does not think that they belong together
